rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that aligns with Vastu principles, ensuring a welcoming and positive energy flow. The orientation is such that the main door faces east to invite prosperity.

rooms.name: Living Room / Home Theater Area
rooms.description: A combined living room and dedicated home theater space with soundproofing and ample seating arrangements. This area also serves as a multipurpose space for family gatherings, following Vastu guidelines by orienting the entertainment zone towards the south-west.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet library with built-in shelves and reading nooks. The layout is designed to promote intellectual stimulation while aligning with Vastu principles by placing it in a calm corner of the apartment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An efficiently designed kitchen that adheres to modern design while integrating traditional elements. According to Vastu, the south-east corner is ideal for the kitchen to balance energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-lit bathroom with water fixtures positioned as per Vastu recommendations to ensure proper drainage and avoid negative energy accumulation.

openings.description: The main door is positioned on the east side to maximize sunlight and positive energy flow.
Large windows for natural light in compliance with Vastu principles by aligning them towards the north-east.
Optimally placed window ensuring serene ambience and light as per Vastu guidelines.
Access to the swimming pool that is integrated seamlessly with the overall design while ensuring privacy and alignment with Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed for optimal rest, positioned in the north-east corner as per Vastu recommendations to ensure peace and prosperity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Dual guest bedrooms with sufficient space and privacy, located near the main bedroom while still ensuring energy flow according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom attached to the master bedroom designed for convenience and aligned with Vastu norms regarding water placement.

openings.description: Balcony overlooking a serene garden area, designed to provide fresh air and maintain the balance of energy.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Space
rooms.description: A creative studio space that can serve as a home office or art room, designed to be flexible and aligned with Vastu by ensuring natural light from the east.

rooms.name: Guest Lounge/Reading Area
rooms.description: An additional lounge area for guests, offering a relaxed environment while adhering to Vastu guidelines for tranquility.

openings.description: A large window that brings in ample natural light and maintains a harmonious balance as per Vastu.
